message.en-US: Grab a chemex from the kitchen!
Fresh chemex is in the kitchen!
<!here> ☕️
rocket fuel is ready
GOOOOOOOOOOD MORNING
Get some coffee into ya!
May your coffee kick in before reality does.
Coffee - the most important meal of the day!
I'm not addicted to coffee - we're just in a committed relationship.
0xC0FFEE
I only need coffee on days ending in "y".
It puts the coffee in the basket, or else it gets the hose again.
If it wasn't for the coffee, I'd have no identifiable personality whatsoever.
grab a no-fat-caramel-soy-frappecino in the kitchen..... lol, jk :)
covfefe is ready
https://media.giphy.com/media/NHUONhmbo448/giphy.gif

Wanna hear a joke?





Decaf.
https://media.giphy.com/media/3o7buf6ABP3J7NpNS0/giphy.gif
Got some chemex ready for ya https://media.giphy.com/media/l2SpXensc5RhNzfK8/giphy.gif
Ooh yeah coffee in the kitchen https://media.giphy.com/media/Z6vszQ8Mweukw/giphy.gif
😘 https://media.giphy.com/media/27Ju5pmIEgv04/giphy.gif
Come and get it https://media.giphy.com/media/iKNufEI6wBJKg/giphy.gif
Please drink responsibly https://media.giphy.com/media/oZEBLugoTthxS/giphy.gif
If you were ground coffee, you'd be espresso. 'Cause you're so fine 😉
Hold the sugar, baby. You're sweet enough ❤️
I feel something brewing between us 😏
You roast my heart ❤️
Get some coffee while it lasts https://media.giphy.com/media/4ooNgw93JL332/giphy.gif
COFFEE IN THE KITCHEN https://media.giphy.com/media/10sKNgit3jiU2A/giphy.gif
Are you coffee? 'Cause I’ve bean thinking about you a latte 😉
Mate, tea, or just more of me? 😏
